short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monaco Viewer Plugin for viewing code in the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monaco Editor Plugin when in installed will activate on code windows for viewing and editing code in the browser. Also you can toggle themes for your viewing pleasure. JSON and Javascript are enabled.
